description: This file provides a utility function to export resume data into a minimal DOCX file format. It constructs a WordprocessingML document using JSZip, embedding resume information such as personal details, summary, experience, projects, education, and skills into XML structure for DOCX compatibility.

methods.name: exportResumeToDocx(data, fileName = 'Resume.docx')
methods.description: Asynchronously generates a minimal Word document (.docx) from given resume data, creates ZIP structure with necessary XML parts, and triggers a file download for the user.
